channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Minor Leaguer to a World Series Legend in ONE Year: Trey Yesavage's Fast Rise
item.description: Trey Yesavage's incredible Game 5 outing, and his rapid rise with the Blue Jays, will be remembered for a long time.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Ravens' Win Over the Dolphins
item.description: Are the Ravens back after beating the Dolphins? Here's what Greg Auman took away from Baltimore's Thursday night win.

item.title: 'Live and Learn': 3 Years After Failure, Chris Bassitt Finding His Redemption
item.description: Chris Bassitt's road to being a relief pitcher in the World Series wasn't an easy one, but he's carved out an important role with the Blue Jays.

item.title: Heisman Trophy Rankings: Haynes King, Julian Sayin Lead Robert Griffin III's List
item.description: FOX Sports college football analyst Robert Griffin III shares his updated Heisman Trophy front-runners heading into Week 10.

item.title: After Brian Kelly's Firing, LSU is Now Looking For a New Athletic Director
item.description: LSU announced that athletic director Scott Woodward is out on Thursday.

item.title: The unhittable pitch rocking this MLB postseason -- and the aces who will be throwing it in World Series Game 6
item.description: It looks like a fastball, until you swing and miss. Here's why the splitter is sweeping baseball.

item.title: Which NFL teams should make trades before the deadline?
item.description: Should the Giants make any moves? Let's look at which teams might swing deadline deals.

item.title: Back to Toronto! Here's what each team needs to do to win it
item.description: Game 6 (and maybe 7) are on tap for the Blue Jays and Dodgers. Here's the blueprint for a title.

item.title: Our guide to every Week 9 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
item.description: Patrick Mahomes vs. Josh Allen? Can Denver and New England keep winning? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 9 game.

item.title: Ranked: The top 50 players of the Premier League seasonï»¿ so far
item.description: Now that we're nine games into the Premier League season, let's rank the best 50 players so far. Arsenal dominate the list -- but who else?
